snippet.title: Arcade Game: The Berenstain Bears in Big Paw's Cave (1984 Enter-Tech)
snippet.description:
An adventure game where you control Brother Bear, a member of the Berenstain Bears family to navigate across the underground chasm to collect toys and to sneak past big paw (papa bear) and to reach outside. The later levels increase with longer paths, more obstacles including bats, falling stalactites, and others.

Note: The colors in this game are wrong so expect a re-upload of this game once there's a mamefix. The game is endless. Used invincibility cheat after down to last life.
